description: Dive into "Romantic Escapes in Enchanting Kathu" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Romantic Escapes in Enchanting Kathu

places.generalDescription: The Blue Elephant Cooking School & Restaurant in Phuket is located in a beautifully restored Sino-Portuguese mansion that was once the residence of a prominent Chinese merchant. The restaurant offers signature dishes found at all Blue Elephant locations, as well as an impressive selection of Peranakan cuisine, thanks to a collaboration with a Peranakan association and Rajabhat Phuket University.

sources.snippet: Blue Elephant serves sophisticated Thai cuisine in an amazing mansion, and it‚Äôs not your usual casual dining place. Save this for a one-time special dinner and consider it an experience. This amazing renovated old mansion has the majesty and grandeur of a house with a long and mysterious history.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

places.name: Blue Elephant Phuket Cooking School & Restaurant

reviews.text:
First off, the place is beautiful. The huge garden welcomes you to an old colonial-like building that houses the restaurant.

The front of house was welcoming and accommodating.

Dining supervisor Phu and dining attendant Erwin's service and hospitality was warm and excellent, patiently explaining to us the food as they were served, and knowledgeably answered our questions about Thai cuisine.

The food was impeccable, a true gem in the Thai culinary world.

This may have been the crown jewel of my first visit to Thailand. A new friend insisted I take the cooking class and I'm so happy she did. It was a truly wonderful experience! This might have been the fanciest place I've been in my life, I can't believe I got to attend such an elite culinary learning experience. Beyond just learning to make the food, you get to try your instructors and then feast on your own creations in the magnificent dining room. I can't wait to take my new found knowledge back home and impress my friends. üíôüêò

Thank you so much Blue Elephant & Instructor Patty!!

This was one of the best dining experiences in my life. It is not cheap at all in Thailand standards, but not the most expensive high class dinner I've had. We decided to let the chef choose what's best for us and took the 2 different course meals, then shared the dishes.
Although dinner was great, what truly made the experience were our outstanding servers - Jane and Erwin. They were both charming, helpful and knowledgeable around the dishes served out.

places.address: 96 Krabi, Talat Nuea, Amphoe Mueang Phuket, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: KUDO Hotel & Beach Club is a vibrant and stylish destination located on Bang Tao Beach in Phuket. By day, guests can enjoy relaxing seaside lounging with panoramic sea views from the pool level, while at night, the club comes alive with glamorous parties featuring live music and DJ performances. With its immediate access to Bangla Road, it's an ideal choice for those seeking a high-energy atmosphere by the sea and convenient proximity to nightlife hotspots.
places.name: KUDO Hotel & Beach Club

reviews.text:
Thank you for your service,was a wonderful trip ever! good location can go to the beach by walk,staff kind and friendly good service with all those smiles made me feels like welcome home all the time ,food and beverage was amazing!!! specially seafood,sadly I didn't have chance to try all those cocktails but I definitely  come back next
year,thanks again üòä

After raising my concerns directly with the hotel management, the manager met with me and offered compensation of 50% for two nights, as well as a private taxi to the airport. The air conditioning issue has since been fixed, and I appreciate their response and willingness to address the situation.

Thank you for taking action, though I still believe the experience should not have happened in the first place for a five-star property.

I was truly impressed by the service and the warm smiles of the staff here.
Even though the weather wasn't ideal, the delicious food and drinks totally made up for it.
They also have great shisha definitely worth trying  and the DJ played such fun music
Thanks for a lovely experience!

places.address: 33, 1 Patong Beach Shortcut Road, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Chang Wat Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Monkey Hill Viewpoint, also known as Toh Sae Hill, is a forested hilltop in Phuket Old Town that offers panoramic views of the city. Visitors can purchase seeds and nuts to feed the roaming monkeys and enjoy the stunning sights from the observation platform. It's best to visit in the early morning or evening to avoid strong sun, and be cautious with belongings around the friendly macaques. The hill also features a shrine popular for seeking lucky lottery numbers.

sources.snippet: You'll meet dogs, goats, chicken, and beautiful view but also, of course, a lot of monkeys.There are also a few view points where you can stop and enjoy the scenery. Be careful with them especially when feeding them the banana. free.it's best to visit in the morning around 9 or 10 AM (as recommended by our driver) as the monkeys tend to feed around that time before sleeping in the afternoon.'
sources.shortName: 35 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon: Get Upto 30% Off

places.name: Monkey Hill Viewpoint

reviews.text:
Such a cool experience, especially seeing the monkeys-there were so many, and the baby ones were absolutely adorable! Even though we didn't climb all the way up since it wasn't too hot, the monkeys are all over the place, so it was still totally worth the visit.
Only on the way out did we realize you could rent them to take you with a scooter or taxi to the top-I wish that had been made clearer or offered at the entrance. That would have made the visit even better.
Overall, a fun and unique spot, definitely worth checking out!

This is a must see if you're in the area. Great views and lots of monkeys. Just don't get too close to the animals and don't bring food with you. If you bring water, keep it out of site of the monkeys.
You can purchase beverages and at the top and bottom of the hill. All the vendors were very nice and welcoming.

Nice trail with lots of old trees along the way to fill your lung with fresh air. Walk uphill till the view point but it's really an easy trail. The view point offers just average panoramic view to my liking probably because it was cloudy. It was fun to observe the monkeys' behavior from afar. Just beware of the monkeys as you walk. They did stop me as I walked by (I had a backpack but no foods) but not in an aggressive way. Walk calmly to the other side if they stop you, not make eyes contact, prepare rocks or a stick just in case work for me. Don't bring foods or if you do just to have some fun, be prepared to protect yourselves. I saw a group of group of terrified/fun seeking tourists bringing foods not knowing how to get rid of a huge monkey stealing their foods and blocking the way.

places.address: Ratsada, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: If you're in Patong, don't miss the chance to witness a live Muay Thai match, Thailand's national sport. The pre-match rituals and the vibrant atmosphere of the stadiums make it an unforgettable experience. Chanrit Muaythai Gym in Patong stands out for its exceptional instructors and genuine hospitality. Visitors have raved about the warm welcome, delicious food, and even a cute cat on-site.

sources.snippet: Going to see Thai boxing together can end your night with a little exhilaration. If you‚Äôve ever dipped into the world of martial arts, you would have heard of Muay Thai. There are two main stadiums to check out for these thrilling events: Patong and Bangla boxing stadium.
sources.shortName: What to Do On Your Honeymoon in Patong

places.name: Chanrit Muay Thai Gym

reviews.text:
Thanks a million to all Chanrit members!
We had an amazing training experience!  Trainers were supportive, kind, patient, respectful and above all things we could feel that they love what they do and they are more than willing to teach with the same determination to all levels of students.
Physically strenuous, with lots of technical, strength, sparring and fighting exercises, true martial arts training.
Our training partners were also respectful and friendly, but serious regarding the techniques practiced and what we've learned in the class.
We'll try to come back on our next trip!
Keep up the hard work!

I've trained all over Phuket and Chanrit has been my favorite gym. All of the trainers are awesome, funny, patient and always willing to help the new guy/girl. I even stayed in Patong an extra few days just to train here. If you're looking to take your training/technique to the next level come train at Chanrit.

The best white team I can ever find in Phuket . This is the place where you can actually come here and then spend a time or two days whenever you have time just to learn about Muay Thai and this is the best Muaythai ever don't forget to come here cause the trainer are super professional, and they are ex fighter

places.address: 188, 2 Sawatdirak Rd, Tambon Patong, Patong, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: La Gaetana is a charming Italian restaurant located in the heart of Phuket Town. For over 21 years, this cozy 32-cover eatery has been serving classic southern-influenced dishes that have made it a favorite among locals and food enthusiasts. The intimate setting, run by an Italian-Thai couple, exudes the atmosphere of a stylish trattoria with high-class yet laid-back vibes.

sources.snippet: La Gaetana is one of the best and longest-established Italian restaurants in Phuket. It‚Äôs well-known and recommended by longtime residents. It‚Äôs not about the view; it is not about the location, but all about La Gaetana‚Äôs excellent cuisine and very cosy atmosphere.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

places.name: La Gaetana Restaurant

reviews.text:
Absolutely incredible! This Italian restaurant is a true gem. The owner is amazingly friendly and goes above and beyond to make sure every customer has the best experience. Every dish, from the starters to the main courses, was flawless ‚Äì bursting with flavor and beautifully prepared.
And the dessert? Pure perfection! Not a single thing disappointed. Highly recommend for anyone craving authentic Italian food and exceptional hospitality!

From the food to the owners, this is a very special restaurant. We had the olives and carpaccio to start (which were  perfect) and then homemade Gorgonzola and porcini pasta and anchovy pasta. The husband and wife who own this place are super hosts and terrific ambassadors for this cosy Italian slow dining restaurant. The chef/owner was so courteous and attentive all night entertaining us with great conversation and lovely stories about his animals in Thailand. He even prepared our puddings (unskippable tiramisu)  at the table which felt very special. The only thing I forgot was to take a photo of the house wine on 23.3.25, it was lovely‚Ä¶ if the owner could tell me what it was I'd be very grateful.

We had an unforgettable dining experience last night.
Every dish we tried was truly exceptional - from the variety of delicious starters to the perfectly cooked, flavorful pastas that were some of the best we've ever had.
The atmosphere was warm, welcoming and unique, making the whole evening even more special.
And to top it all off, we ended with the most incredible tiramisu - the best we've had in Phuket!

places.address: 352 Phuket Rd, Talat Yai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled along the stunning western coast of Phuket Island, Kamala Beach is a serene and picturesque sandy bay that offers a delightful escape from the bustling tourist hotspots. This hidden gem stretches for 2 kilometers and is framed by lush wooded hills, creating an idyllic backdrop for relaxation.
places.name: Kamala Beach

reviews.text: Gorgeous beach lovely just before sunset too, nice chilled atmosphere, u  an also do horse riding on beach, great place halfway down to book trips Delima travel we had a fantastic time at a great price would highly recommend this beach & also the travel place for trips

The area where the beach is located is quite popular among tourists - tourist operators work intensively with this place, accommodating vacationers from all over the world. But, it is believed that it is more popular with Europeans of ‚Äúrevered‚Äù age, as the hotels here are located near the sea and everything you need is within walking distance.

The beach stretches from north to south, its length is 2 km. It is famous for its beautiful nature and spaciousness. There are many attributes for active recreation.

The flora consists of trees of mixed species, - the air here is healthy, pleasant!

The water in the sea is greenish in color. Here are medium, in strength, waves. The depth of the entrance to the sea is above average. The sand is silty, gray in color. You need to walk far enough from the shore to get to the clear water.

The beach is subject to low tides - follow the tides in the appendix.

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON

One of the best sunset views I've ever seen anywhere in the world-the sky keeps changing colors and it's absolutely mesmerizing. There are plenty of activities to enjoy along the beach. The only downside is the frequent approach from traders, which might interrupt the peaceful vibe for some visitors.

places.generalDescription: Tri Trang Beach is a hidden gem in Patong, Phuket, offering a serene and secluded atmosphere for those seeking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life. With its white sandy shores and clear waters, it's an ideal spot for nature lovers and peace-seekers. The 500-meter long beach provides ample space for sunbathing and relaxation.
places.name: Tri Trang Beach

reviews.text: Very nice little beach on the opposite side of the bay from Patong Beach. A less touristy beach but well worth a visit. The area around the Hide Out Restaurant is very good for swimming. Also by the Tri Trang Beach sign, a couple of hundred metres up from the Marriott, there is a shallow area where a lot of Thais go swimming. Numerous restaurants dotted around Tri Trang, most of them located up the hill past the Marriott.

Very cozy, beautiful and comfortable beach is a good place to relax! Its coastline stretches for a distance of about 730 meters - it is a medium-sized beach.

You can find a place in the shade - here they left a casuarina forest belt, which throws natural shade on the beach.

There are no sun beds and umbrellas, which would be available for rent. But there are swings and a local attraction - an elephant, with which you can swim in the sea. Therefore, it will be interesting and fun for both adults and children!

The entrance to the sea is very comfortable, the depth is average, the water is transparent. Here there are no low tides (watch the tides in the appendix) and you can swim all day long. The beach is notable for the fact that you can swim here in the rainy season, this is due to the fact that there is a reef, which dampens the waves before they come to the shore.

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON
Quite and peaceful place and so beautiful when it's sunny not too far from resorts and shops

places.address: Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: La Gritta, located in Patong Beach at Amari Coral Beach, offers an elegant dining experience with a wide-ranging modern Italian menu. The restaurant's seafront setting provides breathtaking views and warm tropical breezes under a starry night sky. From antipasti and Italian meats to pastas and pizza, La Gritta's menu will transport you to the picture-perfect island of Capri.

sources.snippet: Who said there were no romantic restaurants in Patong Beach?. La Gritta at Amari Phuket at the southern end of Patong has a unique view of the entire Patong bay, perfect for a date. Add excellent Italian cuisine at a good price, and you get yourself a perfect romantic evening and amazing photos to take back home.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

sources.snippet: Savour quality ingredients from local and Italian farms and ocean-to-table producers. This traditional restaurant serves Italian specialities, gourmet pizzas, pasta and delectable desserts. Cuisine: ItalianOpening Hours: 12:00 to 22:30Location: Ocean Front Wing
sources.shortName: 5-Star Resort on Patong Beach Dining

places.name: La Gritta

reviews.text: In one word, it is truly magnificent. We chose it for our anniversary and we were very pleased. Ms. Namcha was very attentive and provided good service. You can make a reservation without thinking, the kitchen chefs, everything is great. Especially the pizza and pasta are amazing. Thank you very much.

We went as a couple Monday night 10/3. Our reservation was for 6.30 pm as i wanted to see the sunset whilst eating. We didn't see the sunset due to position of the dining area but the views were amazing nonetheless. The food and service was good. They charge an extra 17% on the total bill for service and vat. For drinks 1 starter shared mains and a side of spinach it came to ¬£94. This is pricey for Thailand, but was worth a trip to the Amari hotel to enjoy.

Went there during my holidays to surprise my partner. In general, vibes were nice but sadly there wasnt any sunset at this area. Dining next to the beach was therapeutic and the view was definitely a great bonus.

Getting hold on the service staff was really difficult even though it was just a few tables. Not sure if there is anyone that was suppose to station outside as half of the time they were inside the restaurant. Food was slightly above average I would say. We sat there pretty long and the complimentary bread came quite awhile later. We didnt even receive any olive oil or vinaigrette to pair the bread with (we were suppose to receive it).

I had the magherita which was okay. Wouldnt say it's super authentic, but I do still enjoy it. Had the bruschetta classica, tomatoes were fresh and thats about it. Should have ordered something with cheese on it that could elevate the dish a little bit. For pasta wise, I had the ravioli al granchio. The dish that stood out to me and I do enjoy every bite of it. It was full of crab and it was not too heavy on the palate. It was done really well. I also had the mafaldine, this was pretty much basic with just tomato base and lobster. Pasta was al dente and it tasted pretty much 1 dimension. Had tiramisu afterwards and this is not bad. However the cream layer on top is a little bit too much and didnt feel like the whole dish was balanced out. But other than that, it was creamy and rich.

Only giving a 4 star due to lack of service and attention. Could work on it. :)

places.address: Amari, 2 Muen-ngern Road Beach, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: L'Ar√¥me by the Sea is a contemporary French restaurant located at Kalim Bay in Phuket. The restaurant boasts an elegant minimalist design with two distinct areas: a dining room showcasing the art and delicacy of contemporary French cuisine with a Swiss Alps influence, and a sunset deck offering unobstructed views for enjoying pre-dinner cocktails.

sources.snippet: L‚ÄôAr√¥me by the Sea is a restaurant with an amazing sea view, serving excellent modern French cuisine in Kalim Beach. Chef Yannick Hollenstein proposes a 5 or 7-course menu with beautifully presented dishes and surprising compositions in a perfectly balanced menu. L‚ÄôAr√¥me by the Sea has been listed in the Michelin 2023.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

places.name: L'Ar√¥me by the sea

reviews.text: It's a beachfront restaurant that gives an unforgettable atmosphere. I highly recommended to arrive before sunset. While the prices are on the higher side, but the experience is absolutely worth it. Every dish has an amazing taste and beautifully presented. Whether you're here for a romantic dinner or a special celebration, you won't be disappointed!

Paradise on earth. Overlooking the Andaman Sea. From the moment we stepped in, dining at your oceanfront restaurant was an unforgettable experience. Chef Maxs's culinary creations were nothing short of spectacular-every dish was fresh, flavorful, and artfully presented, perfectly complementing the stunning seaside view. A special thank you to Floor Manager Tucky, whose warm hospitality and seamless coordination made the service feel effortless and welcoming. Together, they've created a dining experience that truly stands out. Bravo to the entire team!

From the moment I stepped into the restaurant I was enveloped in an atmosphere of understated elegance and warm hospitality. The service was impeccable-attentive without being overbearing, and the staff went out of their way to make the evening feel special.

The food was beautifully presented and executed with precision. Each dish showcased high-quality ingredients and thoughtful flavor combinations. While not every plate was revolutionary, the overall execution was consistently strong, making for a very satisfying dining experience.

What truly stood out was the genuine sweetness of the service. Little touches-like remembering I was with child or checking in just at the right moment-made the evening feel personalized and memorable.

It delivers a polished, enjoyable fine dining experience with heart. Highly recommended for a special night out.

Malfi and the team were amazing, very personable and made us feel so welcome.

places.address: 247, 5 Phrabaramee Rd, Pa Tong, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Sea Salt Lounge & Grill is a charming restaurant and seaside bar located in Patong Beach, part of the renowned Diamond Cliff Resort. Nestled on a rocky beach in Kalim, it offers stunning views of Patong Bay. Despite its prime location near the bustling Patong Beach, this hidden gem exudes a laid-back vibe and serves a diverse international menu to cater to all tastes.

sources.snippet: SeaSalt Lounge and Grill is a beautiful new restaurant as well as a lounge built on a prime seafront location in Patong Beach. SeaSalt is also part of the well-known Diamond Cliff Resort. If you are a little familiar with Patong beach, SeaSalt is just outside Patong Beach on the way to Kalim Beach and Kamala Beach.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

places.name: Sea Salt Lounge & Grill

reviews.text:
We held our wedding at Sea Salt Lounge & Grill and we honestly couldn't be happier with how our day went.

The setting is incredible as it looks out over into the sea. We chose this location as although it is close to the town of Patong meaning everything is accessible, the hotel and restaurant feels very private and secluded.

Our wedding package included many amenities and personal touches that made it so special. The service we received from all staff throughout our stay and on our wedding day was absolutely incredible. They could not have done any more for us. Special thanks to Bright who co-ordinated our wedding and did an amazing job.

The food from the Lounge & Grill was beautiful. We were able to amend our menu to our taste and were able to offer a wide selection for our guests, all of which was cooked to perfection and tasted great. We also had an open bar for guests and the staff were very efficient and ensured no glass remained empty throughout the day.

Me and wife and our family would like to thank all the staff of Diamond Cliff Resort and Sea Salt Lounge & Grill for helping make the best day of our lives so special. We look forward to returning here for many years to come to remind us of our wedding day.

I highly recommend this venue for anyone looking to hold a wedding in Phuket.

Visited this restaurant twice during my stay. The place has beautiful views, neatly arranged tables, and a calm, pleasant atmosphere - especially lovely at sunset.

The first time we came, the sunset-view tables were all reserved. On our second visit, we got lucky and managed to get one without a booking. Both times, the restaurant wasn't crowded, which made the experience feel peaceful.

The food was tasty. I had a non-alcoholic cocktail on the first visit (really nice) and a cup of coffee on the second - that one was more of a ‚Äúnot great, not terrible‚Äù kind of thing.

That said, nothing really stood out as exceptional, especially considering the high prices. The food was solid, but the service felt average at best. One of the waitresses seemed quite unhappy during both visits. Not outright rude, but noticeably unfriendly.

I'd still recommend this place - either solo or with a partner - for watching the sunset, enjoying a drink, or simply relaxing over a quiet meal. Just don't expect anything extraordinary, and be prepared for a few unfriendly faces among the staff.

impressed from the view to the food!
We came for the Sunbay Brunch on Sunday, and the seaside atmosphere was absolutely beautiful. Cool breeze, full ocean view - perfect for a relaxing weekend.

The food selection was wide and top quality - fresh seafood, delicious oysters, melt-in-your-mouth sashimi, and perfectly grilled BBQ. Everything was beautifully presented and very tasty. Staff were friendly, smiling, and kept everything replenished without us having to ask.

There are different seating zones to suit couples, families, or groups of friends.
If you're looking for a premium brunch spot in Phuket with great vibes and great food, I highly recommend this place.

üìå Tip: Make a reservation in advance - it gets busy!

places.address: 225 Phrabaramee Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in a vibrant jungle setting, Kathu Waterfall is a hidden gem that promises an adventure for all ages. A short trek from the road leads you to this charming spot, conveniently located near Phuket Wake Park. While the base may seem unassuming, with a local eatery serving delicious made-to-order meals, the true beauty lies above. To reach the top of Kathu Waterfall, prepare for an exhilarating climb involving steep stairs and slippery rocks.

sources.snippet: Want to know why Kathu Waterfall is one of the most interesting waterfalls to visit in Phuket?. Well, as long as you visit it during the rainy season, you will enjoy this immense series of drop pools to maximum effect and you will realize that this place is worth a look.
sources.shortName: Kathu Waterfall in Phuket

sources.snippet: Kathu waterfall was probably the first talked about place in the Kathu area. It‚Äôs well indicated and found at the end of a narrow road. It‚Äôs not a very impressive waterfall, and it‚Äôs only really worth going during the low season, after several days of rain.
sources.shortName: Kathu - What to do in Kathu?

sources.snippet: The waterfall itself is small and is surrounded by lush jungle vegetation, which is pleasant to walk amongst. The route is suitable for those who want to escape from the heat and refresh themselves in the natural pools near the waterfalls.
sources.shortName: The best places of the Kathu district in Phuket: what to visit

sources.snippet: You can also visit Kathu Waterfall or try the nearby Bungy Jump or Wake Park. Oh and the Phuket Tin Mining Museum is only a couple of km away from the temple too.
sources.shortName: Wat Kathu Temple | The Phuket Blog

places.name: Kathu Waterfall

reviews.text:
Kathu Waterfall is a popular natural attraction located in Kathu District, Phuket, Thailand. It is known for its series of cascading pools and lush surroundings, making it a refreshing spot for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Here's a detailed guide to Kathu Waterfall:

Key Features of Kathu Waterfall

Multi-Tiered Cascades:¬†The waterfall consists of several tiers, with drop pools along the way. The first tier features a pool suitable for swimming, while higher levels offer scenic views and quieter spots for relaxation.

Staircase Access:¬†Visitors can climb up a 130-meter staircase to explore the different levels of the waterfall. The climb can be steep but is shaded, with rest stops available.

Natural Beauty:¬†Surrounded by dense tropical vegetation, the area provides a tranquil escape from Phuket's bustling tourist spots.

Best Time to Visit

The waterfall is most active during the rainy season, from June to November. This period ensures a steady water flow and vibrant greenery. However, visitors should avoid heavy rains as the stairs can become slippery.   Kathu Waterfall, Phuket

A tame waterfall during dry season. So I cannot strongly recommend it. But still nice!

Nevertheless, still a nice side adventure if you want a small hike. There are a moderate number of steps to - and past - the first waterfall.

And then a short jungle walk which is quite tranquil to the very top.

Also a nice couple of cafes at the bottom!

An interesting place with a very beautiful picture.

At the very bottom level there is a small pool for very small children. The main waterfall is located a little higher, after going up the steps.

There is very beautiful flora and rich fauna here. Trees with huge trunk diameters and powerful roots, vines and various plants and flowers create a special, indescribable atmosphere in this place. There are spiders, snakes and lizards - they can mainly be found early in the morning and late in the evening.

Access to the waterfall is easy, so this place can be visited with children to let them splash in the water and take photos for memory!

*

When visiting this attraction, you need to stock up on water, repellents and have comfortable shoes

best time to visit: June - October

entrance: free

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON

places.address: W8MF+Q5C, Kathu, Kathu District, Phuket 83120, Thailand

sources.snippet: When the sun slides beyond the horizon, this unique Amari Phuket landmark takes on an intimate atmosphere with curated craft cocktails, Champagne, wines and whiskeys, creating a unique setting for stylish aperitifs, sunset parties and romantic, stargazing dinners. Cuisine: Thai and internationalOpening Hours: 12:00 to 22:00Location: Close to Ocean Front Wing. Sweeping Panoramic Seaview Vistas
sources.shortName: 5-Star Resort on Patong Beach Dining

places.name: The Jetty at Amari Phuket

reviews.text: This was great.  We really enjoyed.  You can snorkel at the end of the jetty.  Got caught in a rain storm, but we're comfortable under the awning.  Was never very busy, probably because it was a little bit of a walk from the resort.

Following the path from the Amari hotel leads to the jetty, disabled access is a little difficult but possible, so steep inclines and dips on route.

There are toilets and refreshments available.
Some shade from the mid day sun too.

At the end of the jetty there is a barrier area for swimmers, it isn't until you look closer you see the most amazing shoals of vibrant fish, best way to view is by snorkelling.

Staff very helpful and always willing to assist, an asset to the hotel.

Definately recommend a visit if staying at the Amari.

This place is wonderful... the view, the sunset, the drink and staff.
Recommend üòÅ

places.address: V7QJ+CFR, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: If you're exploring Central Phuket Festival, make sure to stop by GINGER FARM kitchen, a delightful Northern Thai restaurant that has made its mark since opening. Nestled in a cozy and beautifully decorated space with both air-conditioned and outdoor seating options, this eatery offers an inviting atmosphere for diners. The menu features farm-fresh ingredients, showcasing the vibrant flavors of authentic Thai cuisine.

sources.snippet: Aside from the temples in Kathu, there is a large daily market in Kathu, just near the "Caltex" junction. You can also visit Kathu Waterfall or try the nearby Bungy Jump or Wake Park. Oh and the Phuket Tin Mining Museum is only a couple of km away from the temple too.
sources.shortName: Wat Kathu Temple | The Phuket Blog

places.name: GINGER FARM kitchen at Central Phuket Festival

reviews.text: The food was delicious and we had a great time. Loved the one dish options and would definitely recommend to anyone! Even the vegetarian options were so good, like the deep fried baby corn. Staff were really sweet too. The soup options were great too! Overall a 10/10 place.

Ginger Farm Kitchen
A charming Northern Thai restaurant that serves delicious and authentic local cuisine. The flavors are rich and unique, yet not too spicy, making it accessible to a wide range of palates. There's a great variety of dishes to choose from, and the restaurant has a warm and inviting atmosphere-perfect for a relaxing meal. You can also enjoy a glass of wine to complement your food.

Highly recommended dishes:
‚Ä¢	Marinated Pork with Sichuan Pepper (Moo Mak Ma-Khwan)
‚Ä¢	Stir-fried Fiddlehead Ferns with Shrimp Paste
‚Ä¢	Minced Pork in Pickled Plum Soup

The service staff were polite and helpful. Pad Thai was delicious. The crispy pork belly and fried tofu can be safer.
The mango sticky rice was first class üòâ The rice was soft and warm, and the mango was sweet.

places.generalDescription: Cruise Club Patong offers an unforgettable experience for those looking to explore the vibrant nightlife of Patong. With enticing trip packages that include romantic boat cruises, guests can discover stunning islands and picturesque canals while enjoying a variety of activities along the way. The highlight of the evening is undoubtedly the captivating drag performances, where talented queens showcase their unique styles through mesmerizing acts set to diverse musical genres, including Cantonese and Indian songs.

sources.snippet: Patong has great trip packages for some romantic boat cruises. There are some great islands and canals to check out. Aside from that, there are plenty of other places with great activities to check out while you‚Äôre on this cruise.
sources.shortName: What to Do On Your Honeymoon in Patong

places.name: Cruise Club Patong

reviews.text:
Captivating performances by all the drag queens here with their own unique style. All of them gave it all in their performances, and there was even one performing to Cantonese and Indian songs.
The first round of the show starts at 11 with a 5 minute break and then the second round before moving indoors. They will pass a tip box after each round of performance and they do appreciate if there are tips.
Drinks are decent and not diluted, and the waiters are friendly and helpful.

Had a great night with very friendly and attentive waiters and breathtaking show!
Queens were fabulous and so friendly!
Since we are staying in the hotel opposite, I can pretty much guarantee we'll be back for a quick beer tonight!

AMAZING! The place is new and the drag show is super great. This place has a very, very, very superior drag show. The show is done three times during the night, inside and outside the bar. The drags are also super friendly!! Love them üíï

The staff is awesome. They do not push you to buy things and drink them quickly. I was out of battery, and they even charged my phone.

Also, the prices are normal for the area, and they are in a menu.

There are other shows, such as a drag race competition, Britney performance, and other things on different days. I really enjoyed this place! Totally recommended üòöüí´

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the serene surroundings of Phuket, Orchid Pool Villa offers an idyllic retreat for those seeking a blend of relaxation and adventure. Just a stone's throw from the stunning Nai Harn Beach, this villa is perfect for couples on their honeymoon or families looking to unwind together. With its spacious layout, guests can enjoy both communal gatherings and private moments. The indoor pool and karaoke room provide endless entertainment during evenings spent at home.

sources.snippet: Nai Harn beach: Nai Harn beach is one of most sought after tourist attractions for amazing things to do in Phuket on Honeymoon. For couples looking for less crowded, and private moments, this place is the best choice. The beach has some local restaurants, fun and engaging water sport activities, and picturesque views.
sources.shortName: 35 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon: Get Upto 30% Off

places.name: Orchid Pool Villa Phuket

reviews.text: We loved staying in this villa. The indoor pool and karaoke room were great fun in the evenings. The villa is huge, plenty of room for getting together and also retreating for some peace and quiet if required. Tom the host was marvellous and  could not do enough for us. Highly recommend this place if you are visiting Phuket.
Experience a peaceful and comfortable stay in this lovely accommodation. Good swimming pool and bedrooms. Overall, it's an excellent choice for your stay and highly recommended.

(Translated by Google) The accommodation is beautiful and very clean. The service staff is very good. Suitable for families to relax together, very private. Recommended for many families to use the service.

(Original)

places.address: 9/110 - 9/115, Ratsada, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Phuket Wake Park is a paradise for wakeboarding enthusiasts, offering challenging obstacle courses and lessons for all skill levels. The park is known as the best wake park in Asia, providing professional coaching and training cables for beginners. In addition to wakeboarding, visitors can enjoy other recreational activities and fitness training options. After an exhilarating day on the water, guests can relax in comfortable lounges and savor delicious Thai cuisine.

sources.snippet: Phuket Wake Park is a long-time established cable ski with a 0-shaped counter-clockwise wakeboard park. It‚Äôs popular and easy to reach and features a few obstacles to play with and test your skills. Great for beginners and very advanced enthusiasts, even for kids.
sources.shortName: Kathu - What to do in Kathu?

sources.snippet: For a dose of adrenaline and new thrills, head to Phuket Wake Park. It‚Äôs a fun place for beginners and pro riders alike. The park is equipped with two reversible rope tow trails: a circular one with 12 stunt figures for advanced riders and a beginner‚Äôs course.
sources.shortName: The best places of the Kathu district in Phuket: what to visit

sources.snippet: You can also visit Kathu Waterfall or try the nearby Bungy Jump or Wake Park. Oh and the Phuket Tin Mining Museum is only a couple of km away from the temple too.
sources.shortName: Wat Kathu Temple | The Phuket Blog

places.name: Phuket Wake Park

reviews.text: As a bystander this place is amazing, I've watched professionals practice for hours here!! Like world class athletes training here.. just a cool vibe and a fun sport.

Recommend learning first as the turns on this mechanism is different but once I learnt it it was super smooth and fun, way cheaper than renting out a boat in the ocean and nice obstacles. If you fall in the middle a motorcycle will pick you up and drive you back very promptly. Nice coaches and cable operators, teaching you how to start.

Our experience at Wake Park was far from good.

We had never done wakeboarding in our lives and just wanted to try. The receptionist did not give us any useful information. When asked about at least some information on how to do it, there was no clear response so we had to find out ourselves. We took a practice wakeboard and the staff at the machine is just so terribly unfriendly and does not give any instructions.

I understand that this place might be more for "professionals", but the guidance for beginners is to cry for. On top of that, when asked for a simple receipt so that we could use it for our Thai company, they rejected to do that. They could not provide anything! May I remind the business owner that this is absolutely illegal. We paid for your service so we should be able to obtain a receipt somehow. Absolutely ridiculous.

Nice though that they gave a cheaper price when I showed my work permit. That is the only good thing I have to say.

If you are a beginner, don't waste your time to come here.

places.address: 86 Vichitsongkram Rd, Kathu, Kathu District, Phuket 83120, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Saeng Tham Shrine, also known as the ÂÆöÂÖâÂ†Ç, is a stunning place of worship that was established by one of the ancestors of the Tantaves Family. This Chinese temple in Old Phuket Town exhibits unique architectural features commonly seen in Hokkien-Chinese shrines, including a roof with an upward-curving ridge shape and vibrant sculpture decorations.

sources.snippet: The Shrine of the Serene Light (Sangtham Shrine) used to be ‚Äòthe little hidden Chinese temple‚Äô hidden right under your nose on Phang Nga road, one of the most popular street of Phuket Town. While most Thais knew all about it, only a few foreigners would be aware of its existence and proudly whisper its secret location to newbies like an old secret passage to some mystic temple. The altar is always fresh with flowers and burning candles.
sources.shortName: 35 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon: Get Upto 30% Off

places.name: San Chao Saengtham

reviews.text: If you like to pay attention to detail, then this is a place you can visit. A small shrine full of vibrant colours.
The shrine is very near Museum Phuket and the Soi Romanee. Peaceful and beautiful shrine. Free entry and you can explore in a short time when you are here in the Phuket Old town.

Hidden from prying eyes by a long and narrow corridor, guarded by powerful white lions, from the street, this temple can only be noticed by a large, beautiful structure by the road of a pleasant, purple color, decorated with Chinese lanterns and amazing stucco dragons on the pillars!

The narrow corridor itself, which leads to the main building, can be considered a small work of art. Everything is very beautiful and green here, and on the sides, visitors are greeted by beautiful statues, sacred hieroglyphs and other signs and elements of Chinese mythology.

This temple is definitely worth visiting while on vacation in Phuket. Here you can have a pleasant and useful time, walk, sort out your thoughts and take a large number of original and interesting photos!

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the üëâ PHUKETON application

places.address: V9MQ+G5R, Phangnga Rd, Talat Yai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand
